fields.name: Id
fields.description: The fully qualified ID for the descendant.  For example, /providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/0000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 or /subscriptions/0000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the descendant. For example, 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The type of the resource. For example, Microsoft.Management/managementGroups or /subscriptions
